text: Ralph James Gregory (19 June 1921 – 2002) was an English footballer who played as a forward for Port Vale, Witton Albion, Congleton Town, and Stafford Rangers. ==Playing career== Gregory signed professional forms with Port Vale in August 1944. He scored on his debut in a Midland Cup, Qualifying Tournament match on 14 April 1945, a 2–1 defeat to Notts County at Meadow Lane on 14 April 1945. He continued to play for the club when on leave from his service in the Royal Marines during World War II. He was transferred to Witton Albion in March 1947, and later played for Congleton Town and Stafford Rangers. ==Statistics== Source: {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|FA Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |Port Vale |1945–46||–||0||0||2||2||2||2 |} ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Stoke-on-Trent Category:Royal Marines personnel of World War II Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Port Vale F.C. players Category:Witton Albion F.C. players Category:Congleton Town F.C. players Category:Stafford Rangers F.C. players
title: Ralph Gregory
